entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 28 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
